content: baby sasha summer outfit in crochet by lauri bolland 1 oz acrylic fingering weight baby yarn size d hook or size needed for gauge uses us crochet terms gauge/gauge 26 sts over 4 /10cm in single_crochet increase= 2 single_crochet in one st decrease= draw up loop in first st draw up loop in next st yo and draw through all loops on hook beg shell chain 3 2 double_crochet in same st shell= 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next st or space top chain 37 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each chain across 36 single_crochet chain 1 turn 2 single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts increase in next single_crochet around 48 single_crochet chain 1 turn 3 single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 1 turn 4 single_crochet in each of the next 233 sts increase in next st around finish with 4 single_crochet 59 single_crochet chain 1 turn 5 - 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 1 turn 8 divide 10 single_crochet skip 11 chain 6 sleeve made 17 single_crochet for front skip 11 chain 6 next sleeve made 10 single_crochet chain 1 turn 10 single_crochet in each stitch and chain across 49 st turn 11 make beg shell in first single_crochet skip 2 shell in next st skip 2 repeat between around skip 2 3 double_crochet in last st ___ shells 2 half shells turn 12 - 18 make beg shell in first st in center chain space of next shell make shell repeat between around skip 2 3 double_crochet in last st turn 19 single_crochet in each st around end off work in ends to close at the top back of the little top make two long chains to tie attach a button and loop or sew hook & eye snap or velcro bottoms chain 29 1 skip first chain and single_crochet in each chain across chain 1 turn 28 single_crochet 2 -
